INSERT INTO t_permission_info ( permission_id, resource_id, operation_id, permission_name, permission_desc, is_valid, is_delete, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date )
(SELECT #{item.permissionId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.resourceId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.permissionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.permissionDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isValid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isDelete, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL )

AND permission_id = #{permissionId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
